adrFormatAddress: 1140 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
I had an amazing one hour skin and makeup consultation with Erica.

She is very knowledgeable and helped me achieve a beautiful polished look.  I would highly recommend her for any of your skin or makeup needs.

Everyone at the store is very nice and helpful.  I really enjoyed my time at the store and will be back next time I’m town!  A big thank you to Erica and Kevin!

originalText.text: Had an amazing experience shopping here. I used to live in NYC and shop here but recently moved to Minneapolis. On my recent trip back, I knew I wanted to try out a new foundation and visit the store again. It's so hard to order foundation online. I learned that they do consultation visits and would highly recommend. We went over my current skincare and makeup and lifestyle and then tried out a new skincare routine and some new makeup products. I was so impressed! I wasn't pressured to buy anything but I loved so many of the products that I wanted to anyways. She was also very realistic with my busy life and recommended a simple routine that I feel like I can handle. Nearly a week later and my skin feels amazing. So nice to have dedicated time and recommendations. All the staff were were so kind and helpful!

originalText.text:
I had such a great experience with this store! The staff was so helpful and friendly, they helped me pick out a new concealer and recommended new products that I wanted to try. I love that Credo takes and recycles old containers through their Pact program and it goes towards your rewards–win win! The staff allowed me to try everything and was very sanitary, with helpful tips and experienced guidance.

And as an avid member, I'm always appreciative that Credo does the work behind selecting brands and products that meet a level of sustainability and what they call 'clean beauty'. You can learn more about it on their site, but it always feels good to be supporting a company that has these values behind them.

Would highly recommend them to anyone that's looking to try products that support the cause!

originalText.text:
Consistently friendly, helpful, knowledgeable service with a great selection of clean beauty products at a great range of price points.
I feel comfortable coming here with lots of questions/asking for help with makeup and always leave happy with new products I know how to use.
Way better experience than Sephora.
